The detachable flap allows you to enjoy gentle or stronger full back massage. Heating therapy of seat massager soothe tired muscles and enhance comforts.

Vibration Massage on Seat: The massage cushion provides vibration massage with 3 optional intensity levels to relieve hips, thighs and release stress aches tension. The neck pillow can be removed and the integrated strapping system anti-slip silicone grip secures the massage pad on chairs in place.

Ideal Gift, High quality PU leather and breathable mesh make back massage seat for durable, easy to clean and maintain.It is ideal fathers day gift for men,gifts for Dad,gifts for women to relieve neck,shoulder back. If you’re not satisfied, return it within 30days for full money back.
